definition: to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent

sentences.english: Leo Fender’s guitars weren’t just versatile, they were also durable.
sentences.chinese: 利奥芬达的吉他不仅万能，而且耐久。

sentences.english: Fanta is a tasty orange-flavored drink that was originally designed specifically for the Nazis.
sentences.chinese: 芬达最初是专门为纳粹设计的美味的桔子味饮料。

sentences.english: The original Fanta was a Nazi product.
sentences.chinese: 最初的芬达是个纳粹产品。

sentences.english: All of Fender’s guitars were noted for their clean, bright sound.
sentences.chinese: 所有的芬达吉他都因干净，明亮的声音而出名。
原因在于市场营销和芬达的历史。

sentences.english: In 1941, Fanta debuted on the German market.
Why Do Foreigners Like Fanta So Much?
Build over ice, top with Fanta, garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.
sentences.chinese: 添加冰块，注入适量芬达，饰以桔皮和樱桃。

sentences.english: Why is Fanta so much more popular abroad than in the United States?
sentences.chinese: 为什么老外比老美更喜欢芬达呢？

definition: Xianchengduo, Chinese brand of orange-flavored soft drink
7 Up (soft drink)/Hedy Holding Co., PRC computer manufacturer
Baileys Irish Cream (brand of alcoholic drink)/see also 百利甜酒[Bai3 li4 Tian2 jiu3]
Heineken (Dutch brewing company)/see also 海尼根[Hai3 ni2 gen1]
